author: The Associated Press
title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world April 6
description: Quebec, Alberta release grim COVID-19 projections. Here's a look at what's happening around the world and here in Canada, where the known number of COVID-19 cases has topped 17,000.
content:
The latest: 
Alberta and Quebec released grim projections on Tuesday for the human cost the coronavirus outbreak could exact on each province, with Premier Jason Kenney suggesting Alberta won't be able to start relaxing physical distancing measures until the… [+21463 chars]
